sourcesContent: import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { LoadingService } from './loading.service'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; @Component({ selector: 'app-loading', templateUrl: './loading.component.html', styleUrls: ['./loading.component.css'] }) export class LoadingComponent { // @Input() isLoading: boolean = false; constructor(private loadingService: LoadingService) { } get loading$(): Observable { return this.loadingService.loading$; } }
